mapper.sql: id, order_no, order_id, warehousing_batch_no, name, sku, specification_model, board_number, number, pcs, weight, volume, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time, remarks
mapper.select: select id, order_no orderNo, order_id orderId, warehousing_batch_no warehousingBatchNo, name, sku, specification_model specificationModel, board_number boardNumber, number, pcs, weight, volume, create_user createUser, create_time createTime from in_goods_operation_record igor where order_id = #{id} group by sku order by createTime asc

select id, order_no orderNo, order_id orderId, warehousing_batch_no warehousingBatchNo, name, sku, specification_model specificationModel, board_number boardNumber, number, pcs, weight, volume from in_goods_operation_record igor where sku = #{sku} and is_warehousing = 1 group by warehousing_batch_no

select sio.warehouse_number warehouseNumber , igor.warehousing_batch_no warehousingBatchNo ,igor.sku sku ,igor.name name, igor.number number , igor.pcs ,igor.create_time createTime , glr.un_delivered_quantity nowNumber , s.customer_id customerId, igor.pcs nowPcs from (select id,ku_code,inGood_id,number,type, un_delivered_quantity from goods_location_record group by ku_code) glr left join in_goods_operation_record igor on glr.inGood_id = igor.id left join storage_input_order sio on sio.id = igor.order_id left join stock s on igor.sku = s.sku where igor.sku = #{sku} and glr.ku_code = #{locationCode} and glr.type = 1 and s.customer_id = #{customerId}

select igor.warehousing_batch_no warehousingBatchNo from in_goods_operation_record igor left join storage_input_order sio on igor.order_id = sio.id where sio.id = #{id} group by igor.warehousing_batch_no
